nodes.text: Governor of the Lothal sector, simply known as Governor of Lothal, was a title held by a Moff who served as the leader of the Lothal sector during the time of the Galactic Empire.

Ryder Azadi once served as Governor of Lothal, but his sympathies were with anti-Imperial voices and he was imprisoned between 13/11 BBY and 2 BBY, following which Arihnda Pryce was appointed the acting governor of Lothal and scheduled for promotion to the full title of Governor of Lothal within one or two years, before being granted such by 4 BBY.
Moff Stattata held the title at the time of being charged by Leia Organa for the theft of her ships on Lothal under the Imperial Governor's administration during a rebel operation there in 3 BBY.

In 2 BBY, Pryce, as Governor, oversaw Skystrike Academy alongside Agent Alexsandr Kallus, and in 0 BBY, Pryce met her demise during the Liberation of Lothal, which also saw the end of Imperial reign over the world.
